title: Lonely player looking for a team/people to play with
body:
Just pretty bored playing by myself, looking for a ranked team, or even just some people to play with. Not really looking for some militant Napoleonic commander that wants to plan next level strats and review post-game videos. Pretty happy to play normals, ranked or arams. Play all roles, except mid. I don't really care about ranked league etc, so if anyone actually reads this, add me.
Gold III right now

replies.body: Feel free to add me always keen for a few games
I feel ya, I'm gold 4 and in the same boat. Work full time so only play week nights. Would be keen to duo if your ever on.
